Text: Dude you are awesome. I've been uploading film commentaries myself. This needs to be encouraged more as they are quite rare in the file-sharing world.
How does one listen to these while watching the episodes?  I have VLC and XBMC.  I am not sure what you mean by "a la Rifftrax."
Thank you for this, good sir! Commentaries are awesome, sadly it seems most people don't care about them, I'll seed as much as I can.
